shortdesc.ph: Enables or disables the placeholder image streaming feature.
Enables or disables image placeholder streaming.
Enables or disables the placeholder image streaming feature.
Enables or disables placeholder image streaming.

p.codeblock: Future<void> enableVideoImageSource( {required bool enable, required ImageTrackOptions options});
public abstract int EnableVideoImageSource(bool enable, ImageTrackOptions options);

section.p: When publishing a video stream, you can call this method to use a custom image to replace the current video stream content. After enabling this feature, you can customize the placeholder image through the parameter. After disabling the feature, remote users will continue to see the video stream you are publishing.

When publishing a video stream, you can call this method to use a custom image to replace the current video stream for streaming. After enabling this feature, you can customize the placeholder image using the parameter. After disabling the feature, remote users will continue to see the current published video stream.

When publishing a video stream, you can call this method to use a custom image to replace the current video stream for streaming. After enabling this feature, you can customize the placeholder image using the parameter. After disabling the placeholder feature, remote users will still see the video stream you are currently publishing.

When publishing a video stream, you can call this method to use a custom image to replace the current video stream for streaming. After enabling this feature, you can customize the placeholder image using the parameter. When you disable the placeholder feature, remote users will continue to see your current video stream.

section.title: Timing
section.p: It is recommended to call this method after joining a channel.
It is recommended to call this method after joining the channel.
It is recommended to call this method after joining a channel.
It is recommended to call this method after joining the channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable placeholder image streaming:
: Enable placeholder image streaming.
: (Default) Disable placeholder image streaming.

Whether to enable image placeholder streaming:
: Enable image placeholder streaming.
: (Default) Disable image placeholder streaming.

Whether to enable placeholder image streaming:
: Enable placeholder image streaming.
: (Default) Disable placeholder image streaming.

Whether to enable placeholder image streaming:
: Enable placeholder streaming.
: (default) Disable placeholder streaming.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p:
When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
